name: Isometric
description: Clean and precise images with a slightly rotated viewpoint, giving a three-dimensional effect.

name: Sketchy
description: Hand drawn illustrations with soft edges, communicating a cosy and enjoyable atmosphere.

name: Flat
description: Simple and epurated elements that focus on maximising the impact of your message: no bevels, textures or gradients.

name: Origami
description: Beautiful illustrations that feint the famous Japanese paper folding art, resulting in a naturally sophisticated style.

name: Realistic
description: Lifelike images imitating the appearance of textures and materials in real life.

name: Retro
description: Ornate style, embellishing images with decorative elements. Pure delicacy.

name: Outline
description: Stylish design that plays on stroke thickness to highlight the borders of the images.

name: Line Art
description: Images in their most minimalist form of design: simple hand drawn lines to get to the essence of your message.

name: Clip Art
description: Charming style with a somewhat old school look using shadings and gradients.
